content.webTitle: College days: Richard Coughlan, stand-up comedian

fields.headline: Richard Coughlan
fields.bodyText: Name Richard Coughlan Born October 23 1979 Occupation Stand-up comedian. Recently performed his one-man show Can You Get a World Record in Rap with Richard Coughlan? at the Edinburgh Fringe Festival College Canterbury College Attended 1999-2001 Studied BTec national diploma in performing arts Gill Workman, section manager, dance and dramatic arts, recalls: "Richard was a talented actor and not only in comedy. He demonstrated this with an extraordinarily confident performance as the title role in our production of The Elephant Man, displaying great sensitivity and insight into the character. The theatre role is performed without the prosthetics seen in the film. He was always ready with a quick-witted response and we were very pleased to see that he has put his comedy talent to good use on the comedy circuit. We will be following his future career in comedy with interest."
